name: info
description: Provides information about me, and links for adding the bot and joining the support server
embedDescription:
[Birthdayy](https://birthdayy.xyz) {{VERSION}} is a bot designed to help you remember your birthday. I use the [Sapphire Framework](https://sapphirejs.dev) for the [Discord.js library](https://discord.js.org).
- [Terms of use](https://birthdayy.xyz/disclosure).
